sentences.english: If using lesser quality, boil water and steep for a longer period of time.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用较小的质量，烧开水和陡峭的更长的时间。

sentences.english: Heavenly Capital, you know, is the most precipitous peak of Mount Huangshan.
sentences.chinese: 天都峰是黄山最陡峭的山峰。

sentences.english: The cliff fell away at his feet.
sentences.chinese: 在他的脚下，悬崖开始变得陡峭起来。

sentences.english: The sand dropped off steeply, and a riptide was sucking the woman un-der.
sentences.chinese: 沙床边缘非常陡峭，并且激流的吸力将妇人往下拽。

sentences.english: Drigung monastery is on a steep hill, overlooking our camp.
sentences.chinese: 止贡寺位于陡峭的山上，俯视着我们的营地。

sentences.english: The steamer passed by steep hills and was close to the destination.
sentences.chinese: 轮船经过了陡峭的山峰并靠近目的地。

sentences.english: They snowboard over cliffs and mountain-bike down steep mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他们对滑雪的悬崖和山地自行车下陡峭的高山。

sentences.english: Above the treeline take a grassy path leading steeply towards the summit.
sentences.chinese: 过了林木线之后沿着长满青草的小道直通陡峭的山顶。

sentences.english: We climbed the steep slope of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们爬了那座陡峭的倾坡。

sentences.english: This force would lead to steep price curve against time.
sentences.chinese: 这个力量将会导致相对于时间陡峭的价格曲线。

sentences.english: Jagged mountains and steep cliffs make up most of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 于是，陡峭的山壁占多数的景观。

sentences.english: Going up the steep slope involved a fresh round of hand-to-leaf combat.
sentences.chinese: 在这个陡峭的山坡上，我又要与树叶进行搏斗。

sentences.english: Long-deceased trees cling stubbornly to the steep flanks of Grand Sable Dunes in Michigan's Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.
sentences.chinese: 一些长期干枯的树木紧紧地陷在大貂丘那陡峭的侧面。

sentences.english: Steep mountains and high plateaus still keep most of the area unpopulated .
sentences.chinese: 陡峭的山峦和高原使这块土地的大部分至今人迹罕见。

sentences.english: The landslides have steepened the mountain sides.
sentences.chinese: 山崩使山泳的一侧变得陡峭了。

sentences.english: In general, seamounts have wider bottoms and steep sides with flat or collapsed tops.
sentences.chinese: 通常，海山底部较宽且山壁陡峭，山顶或平坦或下陷。

definition: sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
